title: Makeup guru Bobbi Brown reveals her top six favorite products from Walmart
text:
If we're going to take beauty advice from anybody, it's going to be Bobbi Brown.

The beauty guru and author has been hailed as an industry leader since Estée Lauder Companies purchased her now-famous cosmetics line in 1995 -- and it's nice to know even the celebrated makeup artist isn't immune to a good deal, like Walmart's beauty section.

From hair dryers to bathroom soaps, here's what the iconic artist is sharing as her top beauty picks from the affordable chain:

1. Dr. Bronner’s Peppermint Pure-Castile Liquid Soap ($15.99)

“My favorite soap of all time. I love the smell, it's in all my bathrooms, ” Brown said.

2. Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer ($389.95)

“The Dyson dryer is the Mercedes of hair dryers. I even have it at my hotel, The George, in Montclair, NJ.”

3. EVOLUTION_18​ Beauty Probiotic ($15)



“The EVOLUTION_18 Beauty Probiotic really helps my digestion, makes everything work better in​ my body. It’s so delicious too, it tastes like a Pixie stick.”

4. Laneige Special Care Water Sleeping Mask ($23.99)

“Laneige Water Sleeping Face Mask is a really great hydrating mask. I always wake up with my skin feeling amazing.”
description: If we're going to take beauty advice from anybody, it's going to be Bobbi Brown.
